resources.string:
You can simply slide the CoverFlowView widget left or right to switch between your coverflow adapter views. 

These views will overlap when you show too many view at once or your view is large. 

You can Change total visible views in the layout xml (default value is 3). 

You can add a listener to handle a top view click, long click and view on top event.
When set \"click to switch\" on, click the left or right edge will also switch the coverflow view \n\nYou can also control to goto previous or next one in your code.
When in LoopMode, we can scroll left and right infinitely.
When your data set has changed, you can just call adapter\'s notifyDataSetChanged() to get CoverFlowView refresh. \nYou can also change a new adapter by setAdapter
You can also goto specified views in one method, CoverFlowView will search the fast way to go to destination. \nAlso, you can close the transition animation.
Index 0\n\nWhen this view on top, checked TAB 1
New 0\n\nWhen this view on top, checked TAB 1
